main event: Five adult citizens observed an unidentified flying object near East Tawas, Michigan, on March 30, 1957.
interesting points: The object was approximately 60 ft. in diameter and round in shape,The UFO emitted an intense blue-white light,It moved slowly at first, then accelerated to tremendous speed and altitude,There was only a brief period of intelligible radar contact before it vanished from view,No explanation has been found for this occurrence from conventional intelligence sources.
sighted object: unidentified flying object emitting blue-white light
